mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.prod_id AS "prodId", a.cat_id AS "catId", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_prod_cate( id, prod_id, cat_id, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{prodId}, #{catId}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_prod_cate SET prod_id = #{prodId}, cat_id = #{catId}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
